TEXT.TITLE: FAIRFIELD COMMUNITIES INC <FCI> 10 MOS DEC 31
TEXT.BODY:
Shr loss 1.62 dlrs vs profit 83 cts Net loss 17.2 mln vs profit 8.3 mln Revs 264.0 mln vs 338.0 mln NOTE:Year ago figures based on 12 months ended February 28, 1986 because company changed reporting period to end December 31. 1986 10 months loss includes 10.3 mln dlrs writedown of certain assets.
Reuter
